resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3417</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Nobel Laureates: 1970- the Nobel Prize in Physiology or medicine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nobel Laureaten: 1970- der Nobelpreis in der
Physiologie oder in der Medizin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lauréats Nobel : 1970- le prix Nobel dans 
la physiologie ou la médecine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Laureates De Nobel: 1970- o prêmio de nobel
no physiology ou na medicina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Laureates Nobel: 1970- il premio Nobel nella
fisiologia o nella medicina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δαφνοστεφές Νόμπελ: 1970- το βραβείο Νόμπελ 
στη φυσιολογία ή την ιατρική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Laureados Nobel: 1970- el premio Nobel en 
fisiología o medicina</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Information on the research done by Bernard Katz, Ulf von Euler and Julius Axelrod
 which won them the Nobel Prize For their discoveries concerning "the humoral transmitters in the nerve terminals and the mechanisms for their storage, release and inactivation".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neurons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nerve terminals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">transmitters</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Nobel Prize</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen über die Forschung erfolgt von 
Bernard Katz, von Ulf von Euler und von Julius Axelrod, die sie der 
Nobelpreis für ihre Entdeckungen hinsichtlich sind "der humoralen 
Übermittler in den Nerv Terminals und die Einheiten für ihre 
Speicherung, Freigabe und Inaktivierung" gewannen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'information sur la recherche faite par Bernard 
Katz, von Euler et Jules Axelrod d'Ulf qui les ont gagnées le 
prix Nobel pour leurs découvertes au sujet "des émetteurs humoraux 
dans les terminaux de nerf et les mécanismes pour leur mémoire, 
version et inactivation".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informação na pesquisa feita por Bernard Katz, 
por Ulf von Euler e por Julius Axelrod que os ganharam o prêmio de 
nobel para suas descobertas a respeito "dos transmissores humoral nos 
terminais do nervo e os mecanismos para seus armazenamento, 
liberação e inactivation".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni sulla ricerca fatta da Bernard 
Katz, da Ulf von Euler e da Julius Axelrod che li hanno vinti il 
premio Nobel per le loro scoperte riguardo "ai trasmettitori umorali 
nei terminali del nervo ed i meccanismi per la loro memoria, versione 
ed inattivazione".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πληροφορίες για την έρευνα που γίνεται από Bernard 
Katz, Ulf βον Euler και Julius Axelrod ωχηθχ τους 
κέρδισε το βραβείο Νόμπελ για τις ανακαλύψεις τους σχετικά με 
"τις χυμώδεις συσκευές αποστολής σημάτων στα τερματικά νεύρων 
και οι μηχανισμοί για την αποθήκευση, την έκδοση και την 
αδρανοποίησή τουσ".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Información sobre la investigación hecha por 
Bernard Katz, Ulf von Euler y Julio Axelrod que los ganaron el premio 
Nobel para sus descubrimientos referentes "a los transmisores 
humorales en las terminales del nervio y los mecanismos para su 
almacenaje, desbloquear e inactivación".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neuronen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nerv Terminals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übermittler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nobelpreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">neurones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">terminaux de nerf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">émetteurs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Prix Nobel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">neurônios</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">terminais do nervo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">transmissores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prêmio De Nobel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">neuroni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">terminali del nervo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">trasmettitori</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Premio Nobel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νευρώνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τερματικά νεύρων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συσκευές αποστολής σημάτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βραβείο Νόμπελ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">neuronas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">terminales del nervio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">transmisores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Premio Nobel</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
